website_summaries.verdict: A great pull-on boot with a safety toe.
pros: Surprisingly light and comfortable for a steel toe boot
Good for people with wide calves
Extra heel support for a secure fit without the laces
Also comes in a brown-black combination
cons: Try ordering a half-size larger than your normal size

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the fit of these boots, but the insides make them useless. I had another pair of the same or similar model that these were to replace. The other pair lasted a few years before the lining on the heel came loose and made the boots hard to get off as the lining would bunch up behind my heel, and when I put them on sometimes it would get under my heel. This pair had the same problem the first day I put them on. I am very disappointed as I usually equate Carhartt with quality products. I threw them away within a week and had to go buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Beyond disappointed in this boot! I purchased these for my husband in August and they were put in rotation in September when they were given as a birthday present. It’s nearly the end of January and these boots are literally falling apart. 4 months worth of wear for almost $200 is not money well spent. I will say they stand true to being water proof but aren’t light weight and rubbed my husbands heels raw the first month he tried breaking them in. Overall I don’t suggest buying them and fully intend to go back to the Justin brand he was getting 18 months out of for $80 less. Disappointing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots as work shoes i process meat in a retail store, on my feet all day , but a must have is a waterproof shoe . These boots are labeled as waterproof, but they are not i dont stand in water i just clean the meat room and the boots get some water on them from the water hose , my socks and feet will be soaked by the time im finished. I would have sent them back but they are very comfortable so i kept them. Would have gave 10 stars if they were actually waterproof. They also fit a little small but i ordered on the big side.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Five months and the soles are falling apart. The insides are falling apart. These are junk.
customer_reviews.author: 7ft Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair although I payed 200 hundred for the first pair in 2014 at gander mtn. They split on the sole at the middle clean through the rubber after 1 1/2 years everyday abuse. Wore them like that for another 8 months. Never fell apart. Highly recommend these. Break in fast too
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: After wearing this boot for about 2 months they are falling apart on the inside and the linner on the inside is loose / broken stitching and is very hard to take them off once they are on.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as these are his favorite kind of boots for work to wear. They hold up quite well to all of the wetness, mud, and dirt he works in every day. We usually buy a new pair every 12-18m as he tends to wear these out probably quicker than most people !
customer_reviews.author: keisha albertson

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt has been a disappointment to me the last few times I have bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Carhartt has been a disappointment to me the last few times I have bought there boots. I have switched to a different brand all together due to the last 2 times I bought carhartt boots they do not stand up to the outdoor farm life. My husband however was still a believer so we ordered these boots and within a month the sole was coming loose and the inside was coming apart. This whole brand is supposed to be outdoor approved, but the quality has really taken a dive.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Best work boots
customer_reviews.text: Best work boots I've ever used. About a week break-in period, but then super comfortable and durable. Soles wear evenly, insulated uppers breathe better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: WCG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: People can't believe i work in these heavy boots, they are hands down the most comfortable shoe/boots i have ever worked in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N

customer_reviews.title: Order slightly large
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered at least 1/2 size larger. I thought the boots would break in a little after awhile and they did with the exception of the steel toe which remained to tight on my toes for me to wear the boots at all. Its past the return time so now I'm stuck with a pair of boots I can't wear.
customer_reviews.author: HLG IV

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Im sadly disappointed since i trust this brand..but they fit half size smaller, so i returned them and order half size larger. When they arrived they still hurt in the back of the foot above the heel. Also, they're heavy, and hard to put on! He struggled a lot every time, same to take them off. So they're now inside the closet, he wont use them.
customer_reviews.author: MoniO

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to condition them.
customer_reviews.text: Good boots I've ran three pair of these same exact boots. They are durable and waterproof. Make. Sure to condition the boots often. I run a bore rig and my boots get some beating when we dig with shovels or are covered in bore mud. They last and they are comfy.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany claybaugh

customer_reviews.title: Boots with unwanted dark spot
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots, but after spending $160 there shouldnt b a dark brown spot on toes. Using these on wedding day
customer_reviews.author: Kindra Graham

customer_reviews.title: ... local store and tried them on and they fit good. Have had the old style of Carhartt boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Found these boots at a local store and tried them on and they fit good. Have had the old style of Carhartt boots for over a year and still going strong. I work construction and put them through a rough time! Looked on here to see if they were on here to buy. Turned out I saved about $25 buying on here!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. He is very pleased. Said they were comfortable from the start. Liked the padded lining (something his other boots did not have). Seemed well constructed and sized correctly.
customer_reviews.author: redhead

customer_reviews.title: Color description is off, picture accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are fine, but I ordered Bison Brown (dark), according to the description - and got tan.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Junker

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these boots after 5 years of use. Though they take a while to break in they are definitely worth the money. They stand up to any and all abuse you can put them through. The true steel toe leaves you worry free of having something drop on your foot. Truly a great quality pair!
customer_reviews.author: Drake Adam Miller

customer_reviews.title: Durable and superior protection
customer_reviews.text: May want to go a size bigger but these last a long time. They are durable and offer support and protection in a high impact environment. Also, feet are always dry, rain or snow or mud.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy McRae

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toes
customer_reviews.text: My husband complains a lot that this boot rubs his little toes raw. So the boot must run narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good deal. Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these for his work boots. Caught a better deal on here for them so that’s a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: A great all purpose work boot for high mountain living, lots of fox tails, tall mustard dirt, mud, snow etc.... bring it on.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Baker

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off the charts wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is not standard to other comparable work boots i.e. keen, red wing, Georgia boot. Ordered a 12 wide. Felt like an 11 normal. Inside of foot was especially bad. Hung over the sole about a 1/2" returning and replacing with keen Dallas wellington.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with boots
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots, I have ordered these same boots 2x now. Lasted 2+ years of everyday wear doing construction each time purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were great until the bottoms split open. Both shoes split in just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Chemgirl1

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a quality boot.
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn for work yet, but have walked around with them and they just need a little breaking-in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 10 thumbs up will for sure being buying these bad boys again when the time comes for new ones
customer_reviews.text: bought these for the hubby for work boots and he loves them says he doesn't even notice his feet hurting after work anymore 10 thumbs up will for sure being buying these bad boys again when the time comes for new ones!!
customer_reviews.author: trish2784

customer_reviews.title: great tough boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Solid as a rock and very lightweight even though theyre steel toe. Im very imperessed i can see these boots lasting a while. They have great tough treads i just went climbing up mountains and huge rocks and through creeks, no leaks and no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: K10BigMudder

customer_reviews.title: leaking boot
customer_reviews.text: So, we purchased these boots October 28. My husband didn't start wearing them until mid November when we went back to work, and a month later, there is alrwady a hole in them somewhere and we can't figure out where. Just one boot is leaking so bad it is drenching his feet.. is this normal??? Once i figure this out i can give a better rating but....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable steel toe boot I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boots this is the only steel I tried on at the store that didn't poke into my toes or feel bent/ formed weird.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: I like this color as well as the black. I rotate. I’ll keep buying

customer_reviews.title: Well with the money
customer_reviews.text: Husband will not wear any other boot. He's a pipeliner and is in and out of water, snow, mud, sand and so on all day. His feet stay dry, and have never had any issues of any kind. We buy a pair every year, this is year 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tarp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots. They fit snug but the leather is ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots. They fit snug but the leather is already breaking in well and the comfort is increasing. I like the heel support and I like the overall design and feel. I will prob put in a premium insole because I have flat feet and this could use some arch. Overall great looking and feeling boots. I would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nadda

customer_reviews.title: My husband welds for 8 hrs. / day and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband welds for 8 hrs. / day and loves these boots!! He was struggling with back pain before, but the support in these boots has eliminated the back pain!

customer_reviews.title: kinda big
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 shoe ..recommended size was 10 for these boots...glad i didnt listen in a way because i ordered 9.5 anyway and still a bit too big.... I recommend 1/2 size smaller if you order these.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boots
customer_reviews.text: The last pair I had lasted me five years. I wore them 5 days a week and more sometimes. Best work boots I have owned.

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot for Hard Work
customer_reviews.text: Great boots run a little large but actually gonna order a second pair really nice and heavy duty.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It took a good two weeks to break in but there comfortable to stand on concrete floors for 8hrs a day

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping and happy with
customer_reviews.text: Return customer!!! Appreciate the product and customer service. Fast Shipping and happy with product

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I work in a pulp Mill and walk in water and all kinds of chemicals daily. These boots hold up the best of any I have ever had and are very comfortable. Just bought my second pair.

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Boot
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and the feel of these boots. I bought these for my work boots because I require steel toes and these fit the bill perfectly. They are comfortable and provide the protection I need.

customer_reviews.title: Width doesn't match label
customer_reviews.text: The width does not match the label. I've only worn them twice. My feet hurt too much

customer_reviews.title: Great boot💯
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and waterproof. Great for all day comfort and trekking through muck

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in my normal boot size. They wouldn’t even allow my foot to fit flat in the boot. Didn’t have time to wait for an exchange and went into a store instead.

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased fir my husband. He reports that they fit great and are comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: I really like how lightweight they are and they seem to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to get them broke in. I am experiencing some pressure points & blistering from wearing them up to 14 hours a day. I really like how lightweight they are and they seem to have a real durable sole. I am glad I opted for the wide width & a half size bigger than I usually wear.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to wear these boots much since I got them, so I cannot speak to the durability of the boot. First impressions met my expectations.

customer_reviews.text: My husband works in a cooler mine and where he works in the mine, he goes through boots a lot. He said he loves that he does not have to tie them and they got great and they are better than all the other boots he had gotten in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but your feet and legs will be warm.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, boots, though they are a bit too warm for summer wear and caused my whole body and legs to heat up. They look great and are very comfortable for boots. I would recommend them, but not if it's hot outside. The leather, stiching, logos, everything is very high quality. I expect these to last many years as I don't need them for daily use.

customer_reviews.title: Carhartt nails it again
customer_reviews.text: Quality craftmanship as to be expected with Carhartt. Very comfortable and durable.

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: My son says these are the most comfortable boots he has ever worn.

customer_reviews.title: My husband wears these everyday. He works in an ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these everyday. He works in an environment that is a constant wear on boots. he dropped a 100lb battery on it and the boots steel toe saved his foot. has a ugly mark where the battery dropped and cracked the leather but they served their purpose and theyre still wearable. Will buy another pair when hes done with these

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: what more can I say - waterproof membrane. Purchased based on size of a pair that I still own. New purchase - should stretch out. Love the new overlap on lower seam, that is where my old pair finally gave out. Great work boots

customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, run about half size smaller than some other brands.

customer_reviews.title: Solution to your pocket shortage
customer_reviews.text: Cowboy boots are a practical girl's best friend. I wear them everywhere, including the worksite. When I'm not wearing work pants with pockets, and I've changed into my skirt of the day, the boots double as a purse. I keep my wallet in one boot, phone in the other, and you can drop your keys right down the front of either one. Perfect answer to the pocketless conundrum we ladies know too well!

customer_reviews.title: too bad very well constructed boot nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Sized too small for me, tight in toe areas, too bad very well constructed boot nice quality. AMAZON.COM shipping very punctual.

customer_reviews.title: Fit was perfect for his size 10
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves them. Fit was perfect for his size 10. Great quality. He was in a very bad head on car accident, and the first thing he said to me in the hospital was “they didn’t cut my boots off.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Best I have had in awhile. Good sole. No slip. Waterproof. Great for working on the farm.

customer_reviews.title: My Carhartts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Carhartt boots are my all time favorite boot. They don't have to be broke in, they are very comfortable and wear very well.I wouldn't trade them at all.I wear them everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Too small but nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these boots in the size my husband wears in all other shoes but these ones were too small, we had to send them back and reorder. They are really nice quality though!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit - steel bent in and digs in foot
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband. He tried them on and thought they would 'break in ok'. He wore them one day and the curve of steel in one of the boots was bent just enough in the boot to rub a terrible sore on his foot. We looked at returning them, but it said returns could not be done if product was worn. So it cost us for this crappy pair of boots, medical cost, and another pair of boots. Terribly disappointed that the steel in them was not formed correctly, but with shoes it is hard to tell unless you WEAR them!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Boots dig into you in the ankle and don't break in well. Can't return them if you have worn them so save yourself the headache and money and go to a local place to buy boots.

product_meta.title: Carhartt Men's 11-Inch Waterproof Safety Toe Wellington
product_meta.description: Charge through your day with the rugged durability and comfort of the 11" Bison Waterproof Work Boot by Carhartt®. Style number: CMP1200-208. Oil tanned leather upper with abrasion-resistant Cordura nylon. Storm Defender® waterproof membrane keeps feet protected from outside elements. Molded TPU heel counter with achilles flex joint for enhanced stability. Cushioned insole for added underfoot comfort. Direct-attached welt construction. Dual-density PU outsole is slip, oil, and chemical resistant. Imported. Steel safety toe meets or exceeds ASTM 2413-11, EH safety standards. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 1⁄4 in Weight: 2 lbs 5 oz Circumference: 16 in Shaft: 11 1⁄2 in Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
